name: Quiver: Serrated Arrowheads
description: Before wielder makes an attack with a bow, they may pay 2 TP to grant it Crit +15. One quiver in a unitâ€™s inventory does not consume an item slot.

modifiers.crit: bothif item|type|bows then fill confirm([Serrated?], 15) else 0 end
modifiers.tpcost: bothif item|type|bows then fill confirm([Serrated?], 2) else 0 end

comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
